name: NeverEnd - teamGigaCat
description:
Never End is a short looping meme adventure platform shooter about an accursed being of light attempting to rid the world of chaos as it decays around her. In this game the player can endure endless suffering with a nonstop loop of running and gunning whilst listening to strange humorous noises. There are also plenty of (2) opportunities to learn about the lore of the dying world, that definitely makes sense. ~ Sincerely, Jaundice Testakles.

Developed by Alex B, Michael D, Matthew C, and Nina W.
